DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. Tha aim of this study is to investigate Safety and Effectiveness of NovoThirteen® (rFXIII) during treatment of congenital FXIII deficiency in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Safety and Effectiveness of NovoThirteen® (rFXIII) During Treatment of Congenital FXIII Deficiency in Japan
DOC.criteria: Male of female patients, regardless of age, requiring treatment with NovoThirteenR for whom the treating physician has decided to use NovoThirteenR (rFXIII) treatment
